title: Otoko Ippiki Gaki Daishou
synopsis: TV anime adaptation of Motomiya Hiroshi's manga "Otoko Ippiki Gaki Daishou" about young gang leader and all the trouble and fights his gang gets into, serialized in Weekly Shonen Jump.
staff: [['Wakabayashi, Tadao', ['Episode Director']], ['Motomiya, Hiroshi', ['Original Creator']], ['Mukuo, Takamura', ['Art Director']]]
